#Load Library

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(here)
```

#Load Data and Check Data

```{r}
data_location=here("fluanalysis","data","SympAct_Any_Pos.Rda")
rawdata=readRDS("SympAct_Any_Pos.Rda",file=data_location)
head(rawdata)
skim(rawdata)
```

#Clean Data

```{r}
#remove columns containing certain strings and drop NA values
d1=rawdata%>%
  select(!contains(c("Activity","Score","DXname","Total","FluB","FluA","unique"),ignore.case = TRUE))%>%
  drop_na()
skim(d1)
```

#Save Data

```{r}
processed_data=d1
data_location1=here("fluanalysis","data","processed_data.rds")
saveRDS("processed_data.rds",file=data_location1)
```
